content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">   <ShortName>Pacific Science Center</ShortName>   <Description>Pacific Science Center inspires a lifelong interest in science, math and technology by engaging diverse communities through interactive and innovative exhibits and programs.</Description>   <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>   <Image type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon" width="16" height="16">http://www.pacificsciencecenter.org/templates/ja_t3_blank/favicon.ico</Image>   <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="http://www.pacificsciencecenter.org/Search?catid=46&format=opensearch&id=878"/>   <Url type="text/html" template="http://www.pacificsciencecenter.org/index.php?option=com_search&searchword={searchTerms}"/> </OpenSearchDescription>
